componentDescription: The foundation for building custom-styled select components.

propDescriptions.autoFocus: If true, the select element is focused during the first mount
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.defaultListboxOpen: If true, the select will be initially open.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default selected value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.getSerializedValue: A function to convert the currently selected value to a string. Used to set a value of a hidden input associated with the select, so that the selected value can be posted with a form.
propDescriptions.listboxOpen: Controls the open state of the select's listbox.
propDescriptions.multiple: If true, selecting multiple values is allowed. This affects the type of the value, defaultValue, and onChange props.
propDescriptions.name: Name of the element. For example used by the server to identify the fields in form submits. If the name is provided, the component will render a hidden input element that can be submitted to a server.
propDescriptions.onChange: Callback fired when an option is selected.
propDescriptions.onListboxOpenChange: Callback fired when the component requests to be opened. Use in controlled mode (see listboxOpen).
propDescriptions.optionStringifier: A function used to convert the option label to a string. It's useful when labels are elements and need to be converted to plain text to enable navigation using character keys on a keyboard.
propDescriptions.renderValue: Function that customizes the rendering of the selected value.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Input.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the Select. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.
propDescriptions.value: The selected value. Set to null to deselect all options.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

disabled.nodeName: the root `button` element and the listbox 'ul' element

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.listbox: The component that renders the listbox.
slotDescriptions.popper: The component that renders the popper.
